sourcesContent:
const colors = [
  "#1abc9c",
  "#2ecc71",
  "#3498db",
  "#9b59b6",
  "#34495e",
  "#16a085",
  "#27ae60",
  "#2980b9",
  "#8e44ad",
  "#2c3e50",
  "#f1c40f",
  "#e67e22",
  "#e74c3c",
  "#95a5a6",
  "#f39c12",
  "#d35400",
  "#c0392b",
  "#bdc3c7",
  "#7f8c8d",
];

export default function nameToRGB(str: string): string {
  let hash = 0; // java String#hashCode

  for (let i = 0; i < str.split.length; i++) {
    hash = str.charCodeAt(i) + ((hash << 5) - hash);
  }

  return colors[Math.abs(hash) % colors.length];
}
